short_summary: Request for Standing Offer  for Miscellaneous Grocery Products in Quebec
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on October 3rd, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
full_summary:
### Invitation to bid for standing offer (POR) for the supply of miscellaneous grocery products
#### Invitation RUS: WS3976528407-Doc3983048695

**Invitation details**

*   **Reference**: WS3976528407-Doc3983048695
*   **Publication Date**: September 5, 2023
*   **Tender closing date**: October 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

#### Procurement Overview

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) solicits a standing offer (POR) for the acquisition of miscellaneous grocery products located in Quebec on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, the Correctional Service of Canada, and the Department of National Defense.

#### Required supplies

As specified in Annex A, the required products for this POR are listed under UNSPSC codes:
*   *Food Beverage and Tobacco Products*
*   *Edible oils and fats*
*   *Chocolate and sugars and sweeteners and confectionary products*
*   *Seasonings and preservatives*
*   *Beverages*
*   *Cereal and pulse products*
*   *Dried fruit*

#### Opening and evaluation criteria

Bids must be submitted prior to 2:00 PM EDT on October 3, 2023. Offers submitted after this deadline may be declared non-conforming. The contract award will be based on the lowest priced bid.

#### Procurement documents

Information relating to this procurement can be found on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17361698?extsite=MTczNjE2OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Service requirements

Please send all inquiries to Ly, Selina, available at [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Health and safety

We require a high level of health and safety for our employees. If sub-contractors will be on site, please let us know ahead of time.

**Regions of Opening and Delivery**

The premises will be located in:
*   Quebec
    *   Except for the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Free Trade Agreements**

The Government of Canada has made commitments to citizens of the following countries under free trade agreements:
*   *Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)`
